document_data.name: Parvida
document_data.mainbody: '''Shestandeliath Parvida''' was a [[dragonborn]] member of [[Clan Shestandeliath]] in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Parvida was the sister of [[Shestandeliath Zaroshni|Zaroshni]]
document_data.History:
Parvida was one of the few known members of the [[Liberators of the Steel Sky]].

On [[Nightal 15]] of 1486 DR, Parvida was killed, alongside her fellow companions of the Liberators,
